author: IGN
description:
In today’s Daily Fix: Superman crushes at box office with the biggest solo Superman launch ever, raking in $217 million globally, Nintendo and Universal have filed a copyright notice for a new movie, but it’s not another Mario. And finally, we’ve rounded up the top gaming industry blunders of the day including an “unintended” Guitar Hero easter egg found in Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater, BBC blunder live on TV, and a Microsoft employee getting caught using AI.

#IGN
title: Superman Beats Franchise Record With Impressive Debut Weekend - IGN Daily Fix

Get a firsthand look at the devastation Thula will deal in Invincible VS, coming in 2026 to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Bulletproof Gameplay Trailer for Invincible VS, a fighting game based on the Invincible IP developed by Quarter Up. Players can get an intense look at Zandale Randolph aka Bulletproof's gameplay. Take a look at the latest trailer to see his quick hits in lethal, fast succession. Fight as Bulletproof in Invincible VS, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Invincible VS - Official Bulletproof Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Butterfly is a character-driven spy thriller that explores complex family dynamics within the treacherous world of global espionage. It's centered on David Jung (Kim), an enigmatic, highly unpredictable former US intelligence operative living in South Korea, whose life is blown to pieces when the consequences of an impossible decision from his past come back to haunt him, and he finds himself pursued by Rebecca (Hardesty), a deadly, sociopathic young agent assigned to kill him, and Caddis, the sinister spy organization she works for.
title: Butterfly - Official Trailer (2025) Daniel Dae Kim, Reina Hardesty, Piper Perabo

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Rex Splode Gameplay Trailer for Invincible VS, an upcoming fighting game developed by Quarter Up. Players can embody the explosive character of Rex Splode and make swift work of enemies with powerful moves and abilities. Rex Splode will be playable in Invincible VS, coming in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Invincible VS - Official Rex Splode Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 'Claptrap is Back' Trailer for Borderlands 4, the hit first-person action looter shooter developed by Gearbox. Players can expect the return of the franchise staple Claptrap in Borderlands 4, offering his somewhat helpful and mildly irrelevant commentary to accompany your journey as a Vault Hunter. Borderlands 4 will also feature a volume slider for Claptrap that players can utilize at their discretion. Experience more Claptrap in Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).
title: Borderlands 4 - Official 'Claptrap is Back' Trailer

title: In Zelda: Breath of the Wild, go the right speed to beat toughenemies. Presented by @USDOTNHTSA

author: IGN
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild now runs in stunning 4K at 60fps on Nintendo Switch 2, and it’s never felt better to return to Hyrule! Whether you're a first-time player or have hundreds of hours logged, IGN’s Ultimate Guide has you covered -- from shrine strategies and combat tips to hidden Koroks, boss battles, recipes, and how to unlock the  real endgame. Plus, we’ll show you what’s new in the Switch 2 version, including Zelda Notes and enhanced tracking features to help you 100% the game.

Presented by NHTSA.


00:00 Intro
00:52 Spoiler Warning
01:00 New Player Tips
02:04 Upgrade Sheikah Sensor
03:16 Upgrade Stamina
03:42 Buy the House in Hateno
04:07 Helpful Recipes
07:30 Best Horses
09:18 Finding Best Weapons & Shields
10:58 Perfect Parry & Flurry Rush
12:07 Barbarian Armor
12:52 Talus Battle Tips

14:16 Lynel Battle Tips
15:35 Molduga Battle Tips
16:12 Guardian Battle Tips
17:35 Navigate the Lost Woods
18:02 Obtain the Master Sword
18:35 Upgrading
title: Expert Breath of the Wild Tips from a 300 Hour Veteran — Master the Game!

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'A New and Toxic Paradise' Tennocon 2025 Teaser Trailer for Warframe, the hit third-person action online shooter developed by Digital Extremes. Players can get a glimpse at what's in store for this year's Tennocon 2025 as the latest trailer teases a dramatic and dark entry into a new Toxic Paradise waiting to be unveiled. Learn more about the Toxic Paradise for Warframe during TennoCon 2025, airing on July 19.

#Warframe #Tennocon2025 #Gaming
title: Warframe - Official 'A New and Toxic Paradise' Tennocon 2025 Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Are We Safe?' Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the latest addition to the MCU and the introduction of Marvel's first family distributed by Marvel Studios. Check out the latest trailer as The Fantastic Four answer the public's questions about the impending doom of Galactus. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the str
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Are We Safe?' Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 45 amazing details in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach that blew us away!

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is out, and as porters worldwide begin trekking across Hideo Kojima’s newest adventure, all sorts of little secrets and discoveries are being uncovered. While much attention will be paid to the grand, cinematic experience on display, Kojima also went ahead and stuffed Death Stranding 2 to the gills with little flourishes and details, some obvious, some very, very hidden.

We’ve compiled a list of all the little details that help bring the world of Death Stranding 2 to life, from easter eggs to ingenious gameplay we can’t believe Kojima Productions thought to even add in the first place.

#IGN #deathstranding2 #kojima
title: Death Stranding 2: 45 Amazing Details That Blew Us Away

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the iOS Announcement Trailer for Hitman World of Assassination, a stealth action trilogy of games in one package developed by IO Interactive. Players can experience Hitman 1, 2, and 3 all on the go with the game's arrival on mobile devices. Take out targets across over 100 hours of intense covert missions as the elusive Agent 47. Hitman World of Assassination is coming in Summer 2025 for iOS and iPad OS.

#HitmanWorldOfAssassination #Gaming #IGN
title: Hitman World of Assassination - Official iOS Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Gaddy Games new calm and contemplative sci-fi simulation game set in the near future. Plan B: Terraform will allow you to shape the climate and life, build supply chains, and build cities. Turn a lifeless rock into a thriving planet as you help humanity terraform a new home out amongst the stars. Plan B: Terraform releases out of early access for PC (Steam) on August 29th 2025.

#ign #gaming #gametrailers #PlanBTerraform
title: Plan B: Terraform - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
StarRupture gets a new trailer and a closed playtest announcement reveal. Check out the latest StarRupture trailer for this upcoming sci-fi survival game for another look at gameplay and more. StarRupture will be available in Steam Early Access in fall 2025. The single-player playtest kicks off on July 29, 2025, and sign-ups are available now on Steam.

#StarRupture  #IGN  #Gaming
title: StarRupture - Official Playtest Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: With the Ember and Blade public demo coming July 16th at 7:00 PM PT, we got a chance to play the game a little earlier to check out what the demo has to offer. Ember and Blade's gameplay has similar aspects to other titles like Hades in its rogulite systems that meet games like Diablo and Path of Exile with robust skills that are meant to destroy hordes of monsters filling the screen.
title: Ember and Blade: 22 Minutes of Hades and Exile-Like Gameplay
